FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING JUVENILE JUSTICE COURTS, GRANTING THEM EXCLUSIVE ORIGINAL JURISDICTION OVER CRIMINAL CASES INVOLVING YOUTHFUL OFFENDERS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE BATAS PAMBANSA BILANG 129, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Juvenile Justice Courts Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Declares it a policy of the State to protect the rights and promote the welfare of the children in keeping with the mandate of the Constitution and the precepts of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child thus providing for a system of adjudication for youthful offenders which will take into account their peculiar circumstances.
